title: Persistent Fantasy Chatbot - God Mode Edition
description: A local fantasy chatbot with persistent memory and god-like control. Remember every story detail forever with SQLite + vector embeddings, plus AI that has full authority over the fantasy world.
author: MiniMax Agent
requirements: NVIDIA GPU with 8GB+ VRAM (recommended for optimal performance)

posts.title: How to Use Your Fantasy Chatbot
posts.content:
## üéÆ Welcome to Your Persistent Fantasy World!

Your fantasy chatbot is now running with **God-Like Control** - the AI has full authority over the fantasy world while maintaining perfect immersion!

### üöÄ Quick Start

1. **Choose Your Interface:**
   - **CLI Mode**: Click 'Start CLI Chatbot' for command-line interface
   - **Web Mode**: Click 'Start Web Interface' for beautiful browser interface

2. **First Time Setup:**
   - The chatbot will automatically download and setup the AI model on first launch
   - This may take a few minutes depending on your internet connection

3. **Start Your Adventure:**
   - Begin by describing your fantasy world, characters, or setting
   - The AI will take control and drive the story forward
   - Every detail is remembered forever across sessions

### üëë God-Like Control Features

- **Complete Authority**: AI decides what happens, controls all NPCs and world events
- **Proactive Storytelling**: Never asks what you want to do - takes action and advances plot
- **Smart Decisions**: Makes informed assumptions about ambiguous situations
- **Rich Immersion**: Creates detailed, atmospheric descriptions as "the world itself"
- **Persistent Memory**: Remembers every character, location, plot twist, and detail forever

### üíæ Memory System

- **SQLite Database**: Stores all story elements locally
- **Vector Embeddings**: Semantic search finds relevant memories instantly
- **Auto-Extraction**: Automatically identifies important story elements
- **Cross-Session Persistence**: Your world continues across unlimited sessions

### üéØ Hardware Recommendations

- **Best Performance**: NVIDIA GPU with 12GB+ VRAM (RTX 4070/4080/5070+)
- **Good Performance**: NVIDIA GPU with 8GB+ VRAM (RTX 3070/4060+)
- **Minimum**: CPU-only mode (slower but works)
- **RAM**: 16GB+ recommended for large conversations

### üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

**Model Download Issues:**
- The chatbot will download a ~863MB AI model on first run
- Ensure stable internet connection
- If download fails, restart the application

**GPU Issues:**
- If GPU not detected, the app will fallback to CPU mode
- CPU mode is slower but fully functional
- Check CUDA drivers if you have an NVIDIA GPU

**Performance Tips:**
- Close other GPU-intensive applications
- Use CLI mode for best performance
- Web interface uses more resources

Enjoy your persistent fantasy adventures! üè∞‚ú®

posts.title: CLI Commands Reference
posts.content:
## üíª CLI Interface Commands

When using the command-line interface, these commands are available:

### Chat Commands
- **Simply type**: Any message to chat with the fantasy world
- `/help`: Show available commands
- `/stats`: Display memory statistics and system info
- `/memories [type]`: View stored memories (all, characters, locations, items, events)
- `/search [query]`: Search through stored memories
- `/world`: View current world state and settings
- `/exit` or `/quit`: Save and exit the chatbot

### Example Workflow

1. **Start**: `python fantasy_chatbot.py`
2. **Describe your world**: "I am in a medieval tavern called The Prancing Pony"
3. **Chat naturally**: "I order a drink from the bartender"
4. **Check memories**: `/memories character`
5. **Continue adventure**: The AI remembers everything and drives the story forward!

posts.title: Web Interface Guide
posts.content:
## üåê Web Interface Features

The web interface provides a beautiful, browser-based experience:

### Main Features
- **Real-time Chat**: Instant responses with typing indicators
- **Memory Explorer**: Browse all stored memories by type
- **World State Panel**: View current world information
- **Settings Panel**: Adjust AI parameters and memory options
- **Fantasy Theme**: Beautiful medieval parchment aesthetic

### How to Use

1. **Start Web Interface**: Click the 'Start Web Interface' button
2. **Open Browser**: Navigate to the provided localhost URL
3. **Start Chatting**: Begin describing your fantasy world
4. **Explore Memories**: Use the sidebar to browse stored information
5. **Adjust Settings**: Modify AI personality and response length

### Tips
- The web interface provides visual memory management
- Chat history is preserved in both CLI and web modes
- Both interfaces share the same memory database
- Web mode is great for exploring your world's rich details

Happy world-building! üè∞
